original_title: So You Want To Be A Pro Wrestler
overview: Very hot pro wrestlers, blond T.J. Holiday, and brown haired Trevor Matthews, mockingly agree to "train" Can-Am Exclusive Rio Garza to be a pro wrestler. Rio should have expected an ambush. You'll be happy that he didn't. Rio fans will immediately appreciate that he has been spending a lot of time at the gym. Gentlemen, this muscular man's face and body simply take your breath away. Boss Sexton's (favorite?) "exclusive" is a god. And anybody this good looking MUST suffer to pay for his good looks. Right? Well buckle up. "Innocently" at first T.J. and Trevor demonstrate multiple holds on each other for Rio's edification. Then they demonstrate on Rio. And you know how things are going to go for Rio. They double team punish and torture him beyond your wildest dreams. And Rio takes his abuse. He is no stranger to pain. Watching T.J. and Trevor humiliate and exhibit muscleboy Rio is as sexy as pro wrestling suffering gets. Rio rules!
title: So You Want To Be A Pro Wrestler
